mapper.select: select lno, title, sdt, edt, tot_hr from lesson
select lm.mno memberNo, l.lno lessonNo, l.title from les_memb lm join lesson l on lm.lno=l.lno where lm.mno=#{value}
mapper.insert: insert into lesson(lno, title, cont, sdt, edt, mno, tot_hr, day_hr) values(#{no}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{ownerNo}, #{totalHours}, #{dayHours})
mapper.update: update lesson set title=#{title}, cont=#{contents}, sdt=#{startDate}, edt=#{endDate}, tot_hr=#{totalHours}, day_hr=#{dayHours} where lno=#{no}
